name: Confederation of European Senior Expert Services
legal: association internationale sans but lucratif, international not-for-profit association incorporated under Belgian law
membership:
Alliance for the 2011 European Year of Volunteering
Member of Confederation of European Volonteers (CEV)
goal:
-represent senior volunteer organisations vis-?-vis the European Institutions, while creating a commonality of intents for the senior volunteers' associations across the EU
-an example of Volunteers in Action for the benefit of developing countries
-to help eradicate poverty
-to assist small and medium size enterprises in developing countries
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: All items related to the Intergenerational initiatives from the EU institutions (Parliament / Commission)
